name: kilo-web
description: Web version of Kilo Code - AI-powered coding assistant

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ui && npm install
scripts.install:clean: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd ui && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && cd ui && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.test:websocket: echo 'WebSocket test requires manual testing via browser'
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'node server.js' || echo 'No server process found'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm start
scripts.validate: npm audit && cd ui && npm audit
scripts.update: npm update && cd ui && npm update

author: Kilo Code Team
